Kyree Fisher
portfolio about gallery

The World of Asteria – From Above and Below

outcome: publication

dimensions: 5.5" x 8.5"

role: layout design, information architecture, publication

tools:

inDesign Procreate Notion

time period: April – May 2022

project summary:

A publication exploring the World of Asteria, a Dungeons and Dragons homebrew campaign book based on the style of D&D books

Based on the style of Dungeons & Dragons (D&D) books, this booklet was made for my personal D&D campaign.
My main goal for this booklet was to create a comprehensive and stylistically consistent booklet that anyone could use to run a campaign (a D&D game) in this world. I also wanted to give it that worn and torn feeling often associated with older medieval D&D campaign settings. I created all of the layout, as well as all of the images and copy.

last updated: 1-26-2023
